long_description: A stable bike built for developing riders, the Electra Hawaii 1 20'' girls' bike is a great next step for girls who want a fun bike that looks great and lets them cruise in style. Sturdy steel frame withstands all sorts of abuse; metal chain cover and fenders help protect child from grime and moving parts. Floral graphics on the frame, fenders and chainguard suit a young lady's tastes; she'll find them on the spring-cushioned saddle as well. Low step-through frame accommodates a wide range of heights and makes mounting and dismounting the saddle quick and easy. Integrated coaster brake is both effective and intuitively simple to use-just have her pedal in reverse. With a single speed and coaster brakes, the child-size Hawaii is simplicity itself; there are no shifters or hand brakes to concern a new rider. Ergonomic saddle helps balance the child atop the bike in comfort; handlebar design accommodates an upright ride and enhances control. Wide balloon tires enhance stability and traction. Specs subject to change.
short_description: A stable bike built for developing riders, the Electra Hawaii 1 20'' girls' bike is a great next step for girls who want a fun bike that looks great and lets them cruise in style.
